question:
“Never before was perpetrated an act of Injustice as flagrant as readjustment of the cotton duties in favour of Lancashire”. 
The above reaction against the imposition of Tariff and Cotton Duties Act of 1894 and 1896 was given by which among the following leaders?
explanation: Bal Gangadhar Tilak quoted about the Imposition of Tariff and Cotton Duties Act of 1894 and 1896 that “Never before was perpetrated an act of Injustice as flagrant as readjustment of the cotton duties in favour of Lancashire”.
